name: My Music Rating System (MMRS)
short_description:
Create your very Own Top 50 to Top 500 Music Tracks/ Song Collection. Any Genre of your choice. Complete with sensible Tags and relevant Pictures/Videos.
MMRS will analyse each track for intrinsic data and prompt you through the Rating Process based on Genre; Mood; Tempo; Message; Feel; Beat; Vibe; Volume.
Now you can Set the Stage for a Romantic Dinner, Corporate Function or All-Out Bash - with the Confidence that each Collection has been Rated, and Approved by you !!!
MMRS (for Windows) works with all up-to-date music/video players using the latest available sound & video formats.
This formidable task will normally take Weeks to do - only to discover your Ratings have changed.
RMMS easily guides you through this Re-Rating process - in a fraction of the time.
MMRS - "Quality - is Everything !!!"
Steph Lindeque - Originator - Rondezvous Music
summary: Rate & Sort your Music Collection with User-Defined Criteria
